Text:
Why would anyone upload something without first doing the obvious???

Dude, SIXTEEN other people have uploaded Mac OS X.  I mean, seriously ... show a little initiative first and complete a search on the things you want to upload.  Why waste TPB's server space on this shit???

http://thepiratebay.sx/search/Mac%20OS%20X%20Mountain%20Lion/0/99/300

For fuck's sake, there are two versions on here with OVER **500*** constant seeders.

JESUS CHRIST.

Allow me to further clarify:

"Dude, SIXTEEN other people have uploaded Mac OS X Mountain Lion."

Take this shit down.
ClubQBall, Stfu. Nobody told you to download my damn torrent, So go kill yourself you dumb bitch!

@clap99 - Look here, you silly little dumb motherfucker, you're wasting fucking BANDWIDTH uploading the SAME GODDAMNED BULLSHIT that ***sixteen*** other fucking people have already fucking uploaded.  

And you're right, you camel-fucking, bloody-pimple-on-a-rhesus-monkey's-ass, nobody told me to download this fucking ridiculous piece of shit ... BECAUSE I ALREADY HAVE IT, SHIT-FOR-FUCKING BRAINS!!!

As for killing myself?  Man, fucki you and that hair, sway-backed nag you fucking rode in on, putz.  So how 'bout you have a Coke and a smile and shut the fuck up?  Go do somethin' constructive with your sad little life instead of slappin' that pathetic little pecker of yours up against that fat bitch of a momma's greasy thigh who whelped your ignorant, retarded ass?

Now, sunshine ... KISS MY MOTHERFUCKIN' ASS. Dumb-ass fuckin' shithead .. learn to fucking read and do everyone else a goddamned favor.

Both fucking torrents of yours are shit ...

This one and the other one your fucked-up retarded somehow managed to upload ... BUT FORGOT TO FUCKING SEED!!!

http://thepiratebay.sx/user/clap99/

LOOK FAMILIAR, GENIUS???
